games.name: valorant
games.description: Valorant is a free-to-play 5v5, character-based tactical shooter. The game operates on an economy-round, objective-based, first-to-13 competitive format where you select a unique agent to play for the entirety of the match.

games.name: fortnite
games.description: Fortnite is a popular shooter game with a unique building mechanic. Join millions of players worldwide in epic battles and creative adventures.

games.name: minecraft
games.description: Minecraft is a sandbox game that allows players to build and explore virtual worlds made up of blocks. Unleash your creativity and embark on exciting adventures!

games.name: league of legends
games.description: League of Legends is a fast-paced, competitive online game that combines the speed and intensity of an RTS with RPG elements. Join millions of players in the world's largest online gaming community!

games.name: dota2
games.description: Dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game developed and published by Valve. Join the battle and compete with players from around the world!

games.name: World of Warcraft
games.description: World of Warcraft is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) where players can explore a vast fantasy world, complete quests, and engage in epic battles.

games.name: overwatch
games.description: Overwatch is a team-based multiplayer first-person shooter game developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment. Join the fight and showcase your skills!

games.name: pubg
games.description: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG) is a battle royale game where players fight to be the last person standing. Drop in, gear up, and survive!
